userStories.title: MiniMap Theme-Aware Styling
userStories.description: MiniMap background still appears dark in light mode. Remove hardcoded dark class overrides and let ReactFlow's colorMode handle it natively.
acceptanceCriteria: MiniMap background matches light/dark theme automatically
MiniMap node fills are visible in both themes

userStories.title: Increase Node Size and Layout Spacing
userStories.description: Nodes are too small in the default bird's-eye view. Increase BaseNode min-width, increase dagre layout nodesep/ranksep to prevent overlap, and increase fitView padding so nodes are readable on load.
acceptanceCriteria: dagre layout spacing prevents node overlap
fitView padding makes nodes readable without zooming

userStories.title: Edge Visibility and Handle Styling
userStories.description: Connection lines (edges) between nodes must be clearly visible in both themes. Handle dots on nodes must be visible. Edge stroke color should adapt to light/dark mode.
acceptanceCriteria: Edges are clearly visible in dark mode (blue animated lines)
Edges are clearly visible in light mode (darker blue or contrasting color)
Handle dots on nodes are visible in both themes
